Mayor's Office
==============

About the Mayor
---------------

Mayor Marcus Vajdos can be reached via [email](mailto:%20mayor@springvalleytx.com) or at City Hall at 713-465-8308.   
  

Address
-------

Mayor Marcus Vajdos  
City of Spring Valley Village  
1025 Campbell Rd.  
Houston, Texas 77055
